headline: Linde Expanding CO2 Capacity in the U.S. Gulf Coast
summary: Linde announced it is doubling the capacity of its Freeport, Texas, carbon dioxide production facility by adding a second CO2 liquefaction plant. Starting up in 2027, the new plant will liquefy crude...

headline: LINDE PLC : Bernstein maintains a Buy rating
summary: Already positive, the research from Bernstein and its analyst Peter Clark still consider the stock as a Buy opportunity. The target price is unchanged and still at USD 500.
